Constructor Detail

Method Detail

formatMem

public static String formatMem(long mem)

getMemory

public static String getMemory()

registerLog

public void registerLog(LogInterface log)
This method allows you to register a class that implements the LogInterface(). Every log so registered will get a copy of every log message, along with its mask.

internalPrintln

public void internalPrintln(int mask,
                            String message)
This method will timestamp the log entry then call all the log objects to store the message, if they want to.

Parameters:
mask - bit mask defining what type of message this is
message - the string message to be printed to the log

println

public void println(int mask,
                    String message)

print

public void print(Throwable e)

close

public void close()
Steps through the logs and closes all of them. Necessary since they could be implemented using files with buffers.

flush

public void flush()
Steps through the logs and flushes all of them. Necessary since they could be implemented using files with buffers.
